timeline.message: Adding ability to check if manifests exist in registry
Adding ability to check if manifests exist in registry

timeline.bodyText: Since we've removed the iterator().next() code below and the CheckImageStep code can fully work without the assumption that there should be a single image, I think we can remove this verify line.
timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText: At this point, I think we'd better rename this to CheckManifestStep().
timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText: Let's rename checkImageInTargetRegistry() to checkManifestInTargetRegistry() on line 494.
timeline.author: chanseokoh
